com.google.appinventor.components.common

Class PropertyTypeConstants

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.appinventor.components.common.PropertyTypeConstants

  • public class PropertyTypeConstants
extends java.lang.Object
    Constants for specifying which PropertyEditor should be used for modifying a property value within the Designer. This is used within DesignerProperty.editorType().

        Constant Field Values

      • PROPERTY_TYPE_STRING

        public static final java.lang.String PROPERTY_TYPE_STRING
        Strings. This has the same effect as, but is preferred in component definitions to, PROPERTY_TYPE_TEXT).
        See Also:
        com.google.appinventor.client.widgets.properties.StringPropertyEditor, Constant Field Values

      • PROPERTY_TYPE_TEXT

        public static final java.lang.String PROPERTY_TYPE_TEXT
        Text. This has the same effect as PROPERTY_TYPE_STRING, which is preferred everywhere except as the default value for DesignerProperty.editorType().
        See Also:
        com.google.appinventor.client.widgets.properties.TextPropertyEditor, com.google.appinventor.client.widgets.properties.TextAreaPropertyEditor, Constant Field Values

      • PROPERTY_TYPE_SIZING

        public static final java.lang.String PROPERTY_TYPE_SIZING
        Choices of the "Sizing" property in Form.java. Used to specify if we are going to use the true size of the real screen (responsize) or scale automatically to make all devices look like an old phone (fixed).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROPERTY_TYPE_FIREBASE_URL

        public static final java.lang.String PROPERTY_TYPE_FIREBASE_URL
        FirebaseURL -- A type of String property that has a special default value selected via a checkbox.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROPERTY_TYPE_SCALING

        public static final java.lang.String PROPERTY_TYPE_SCALING
        Specifies how a picture is scaled when its dimensions are changed. Choices are 0 - Scale proportionally, 1 - Scale to fit See com.google.appinventor.client.widgets.properties.ScalingChoicePropertyEditor
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
